quotes.quote: You have to love yourself or you'll never be able to accept compliments from anyone.
The most sincere compliment we can pay is attention.
Compliments and criticism are all ultimately based on some form of projection.
No compliment can be eloquent, except as an expression of indifference.
To pay compliments to the one we love is the first method of caressing, a demi-audacity venturing. A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
The best compliment to a mother is to appreciate her little one.

The best advice is often the compliments received, and they are often about an associate who did something exceptional. I tell my teams that it's the random acts of kindness, the unexpected, that people remember most.
Compliments cost nothing, yet many pay dear for them.
An occasional compliment is necessary to keep up one's self-respect.

The best compliment to a child or a friend is the feeling you give him that he has been set free to make his own inquiries, to come to conclusions that are right for him, whether or not they coincide with your own.
Everybody likes a compliment.
Compliments land as soft and gentle on my ears as a butterfly.
If you can't get a compliment any other way, pay yourself one.
A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
Complimenting someone in an exaggerated way is known as flattery, and flattery will generally get you anything you want.
The finest compliment you can pay a man is that his word was as good as gold.
Compliments aren't really a journalistic angle.
The young compliment their greatness on the number of their friends; the old, on the confidence of them.
No compliment is ever sufficient and every insult, of course, is true.
If people did not compliment one another there would be little society.
Compliment people. Magnify their strengths, not their weaknesses.
A compliment is verbal sunshine
It's still a compliment when you're backed by younger and older, but it's actually unexpected. It's surprising, but for me it's in fact the most beautiful compliment.
Compliment others on the virtues they have; and they're not half as pleased as being complimented for the ones they don't have.
It's good to receive compliments, and it's even better to give them.
If your compliments are making women feel uncomfortable, scared, anxious, annoyed or harassed, you're probably not doing them right.
A sincere compliment is always grateful to a lady, so long as you don't try to knock her down with it.
A compliment is usually accompanied with a bow, as if to beg pardon for paying it.
